pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ordinary Differential Equation (ODE) Solvers Written in R Using S4 Classes // Show Physics and engineering students how an ODE solver is made and how effective classes can be for the construction of the equations that describe how effective classes can be for the construction of equations that describe the natural phenomena. Most of the ideas come from the book on "Computer Simulations in Physics" by Harvey Gould, Jan Tobochnik, and Wolfgang Christian. Book link: http://www.compadre.org/osp/items/detail.cfm?ID=7375.
